mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet (petid, userid, petname, petbreed, birthdate, pettypeid, createdat, pfile) VALUES ( pet_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{petName}, #{petBreed}, #{birthDate}, #{petTypeId}, SYSDATE, #{pfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.petid, p.petname, p.petbreed, p.birthdate, p.pettypeid, p.createdat, p.pfile FROM pet p JOIN users u ON p.userid = u.userid WHERE u.userid = #{userId} ORDER BY p.createdat DESC
SELECT p.petid, p.petname, p.petbreed, p.birthdate, p.pettypeid, p.createdat, p.pfile FROM pet p WHERE p.userid = #{userId} AND p.petid = #{petId}

SELECT p.petid, u.email, p.petname, p.petbreed, p.birthdate, p.pettypeid, p.createdat, p.pfile FROM pet p JOIN users u ON p.userid = u.userid WHERE u.email LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') OR p.petname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') ORDER BY u.createdat DESC
